entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-10-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Weird behavior changing scale between monitors 100% scale vs 125% #17988
  • Enable <Nullable> in .NET MAUI project templates #17987
  • Add semantic properties for the Toolbar BackButton #17984
  • Border controls margin property only seems to affect left and bottom #17982
  • [regression/8.0.0] - modal to modal doesnt call OnNavigatedTo #17978
    .NET 8 GA
  • MediaPicker.CaptureVideoAsync() returns null on Android API 33 (Android 13.0) #17977
  • ApplyQueryAttributes is called with old parameters #17976
  • [WinUI] The app crashes when dragging Slider thumb near the end #17974
    .NET 8 SR1
  • CollectionView with grouping show duplicates groups or crash when adding/removing data on iOS and MacCatalyst #17969
  • Deep Linking on Android Hides TitleView & ToolbarItems #17967
  • Header in flyout menu makes first menu item not clickable on IOS #17965
    .NET 8 GA

Closed

  • MaximumHeightRequest property of ScrollView is incorrect on Android. #16464
    .NET 8 SR3
  • How are we doing in the repo? -- spot check #17556
    .NET 8 Planning
  • XAML Schemas Namespace Customization Not Supported Without 'x:Name' Declaration #16466
    Backlog
  • Maui Map touch control not working or stops working soon #15714
  • iOS: ShellFlyoutRenderer setOverrideUserInterfaceStyle "unrecognized selector sent to instance" exception #17892
    .NET 8 GA
  • [UITests] Legacy iOS tests currently not producing results on main #17945
    .NET 8 GA
  • [MAUI] D1 text fill editor page lacks an entire line of underlines. #17473
    .NET 8 GA
  • [Android] Combination of ContentLayout, ImageSource and Text on a Button causes issues with Text #17811
  • macOS / VSCode - Not compiling anymore #17541
  • [regression/7.0.0] Grid is not aligned center #17643
    .NET 7 + Servicing

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make sure to not call new APIs on old iOS #17989
    .NET 8 GA
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc2.1] Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17986
    .NET 8 GA
  • Revert "Work around the dotnet tool restore issues" #17983
  • [net8.0] Revert new packages names for iOS and update packages #17980
    .NET 8 GA

Merged

  • [Housekeeping] Update bug-report.yml #17981
  • [Android] Fix ScrollView filling layouts #17243
    area/layout 🔲, platform/android 🤖, layout-scrollview, .NET 8 SR3
  • Make Entitlements in Templates for MacCatalyst more consistent between debug and release configs. #17833
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, Blazor ❤️ MAUI, .NET 8 GA
  • Revert UITest dependency version bump #17972
    platform/iOS 🍎, t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Bump NSubstitute from 4.3.0 to 5.1.0 #17975
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Merge `net8.0` into `main` #17906
    .NET 8 SR1
  • Fail UI test run when all tests are inconclusive #17971
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing
  • Only attach log files for current test #17949
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing

Updated

  • ScrollView content needs layout when ScrollView.InvalidateMeasure is called #17639
    area/layout 🔲, partner/hot-reload-xaml, Under Consideration
  • Fixed null coalesce issues #17920
  • Update Blazor Hybrid template to match ASP.NET Core Blazor Web template #17946
    area/blazor 🕸️, area/templates 📄, .NET 8 GA
  • Update .NET versions to be the latest public release on nuget.org #17961
    area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Fix ContentPage BackgroundImageSource not working #17789
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Correctly clear text tapping the clear button on Entry #17543
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, Under Consideration
  • Enable more legacy tests #17931
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/testing, .NET 8 SR1
  • [iOS] Keep textcolor on characterspacing #17926
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 GA
  • Fixes iOS Elastic Scrolling #6689 #17963
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, s/pr-needs-author-input, Under Consideration
  • [Android] Removes freeze using SecureStorage #17928
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/essentials 🍞, .NET 8 SR1
  • Make Android respect power saving/disabled animations #17287
    .NET 8 SR3
  • Reinstate animated GIF on iOS & macOS #17207
    platform/macOS 🍏, platform/iOS 🍎, area/image :framed_picture:, area/controls 🎮, control-image, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix Label Multilinetruncation (MaxLines / LineBreakMode) #14918
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, .NET 8 SR3
  • Fix OnPlatform + Setter when no match for current platform #17061
    area/Xaml </>, .NET 8 SR2
  • PanGesture notify Completed event moving outside View limits #15700
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, s/pr-needs-author-input, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • [iOS] Fix gestures in Label Spans #15544
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/gestures, .NET 8 SR2
  • Implement touch interception for layouts on Android #13725
    area/layout 🔲, s/pr-needs-author-input, stale, .NET 8 SR2
  • IsNullOrEmpty for Paint not returning true if Color(s) are not set #15668
    area/drawing ✏️, community ✨, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Windows] Fix tab colors not updating on add/remove #17591
    platform/windows 🪟, area/shell 🐢, area/desktop 🖥️, stale, .NET 8 SR1
  • [Android] Avoid issues creating a Borderless Entry with a custom Handler #17778
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the androidx group with 15 updates #17793
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Bump the windowsappsdk group with 2 updates #17956
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget, .NET 8 SR1
  • Android Ecosystem updates - AndroidX #17318
    .NET 8 SR1
